title: Cthulhu Quiz
description: A quiz to know the cthulhu cultists around the earth.

questions.title: Who wrote the Necronomicon?
questions.description: The Necronomicon â€“ showed in a lot of stories and became a masterpiece of the pop culture. Was created to give credibility to a world that if, not realistic is at least believable.
questions.success: The Necronomicon is credited to author Abdul Alhazred, who we can presume was both an Arab and quite mad.

questions.title: In what form does Nyarlathotep typically manifest?
questions.description: Nyarlathotep is one of the most feared entities by humans, just for the pleasrure it feels when it comes to invoke madness an chaos.
questions.success: Nyarlathotep is usually seen as a tall Egyptian man who attracts many followers.
alternatives: An invisible force of great Power
A moving lake filled with slowly blinking eyes
An enormous mass which extrudes black tentacles, with goat legs

questions.title: Where does Wilbur go to try and borrow a copy of the Necronomicon?
questions.description: The Necronomicon has spells that Wilbur can use to summon the Old Ones.
questions.success: The librarian at Miskatonic University denies Wilbur's request.

questions.title: What is - the Black Goat of the Woods - ?
questions.description: A Great Old One that first appeared at the -The Last Test-
questions.success: Shub-Niggurath is the Black Goat of the Woods With a Thousand Young..

questions.title: What does Cthulhu look like?
questions.description: The old one slumbers at R'lyeh.
questions.success: Lovecraft described Cthulhu as giant green monstrosity bearing an awful squid-head with writhing feelers.
alternatives: A round fungus with numerous eye stalks
A green-skinned man with blades for hands
A mass of glowing orbs, with eyes or tendrils
A giant green humanoid with a vaguely octopus like head
